example.description: Loging in and out using apf.auth.
example.source:
<a:appsettings debug = "false" outline = "false" skinset = "default" allow-blur = "true" undokeys = "true"> <a:auth login = "{comm2.login(username, password)}" logout = "{comm2.logout()}" fail-state = "stFail" error-state = "stError" login-state = "stIdle" logout-state = "stLoggedOut" waiting-state = "stLoggingIn" /> </a:appsettings>
<a:rpc id = "comm2" protocol = "cgi" http-method = "post" route-server = "rpcproxy.php" autoroute = "true"> <a:method name = "login" url = "demo/login.php"> <a:param name="username" /> <a:param name="password" /> </a:method> <a:method name = "logout" url = "demo/logout.php"></a:method> </a:rpc>
<a:state-group id = "stGr1" loginMsg.visible = "false"> <a:state id = "stFail" loginMsg.value = "Username or password incorrect" loginMsg.visible = "true" log_email.disabled = "false" log_password.disabled = "false" /> <a:state id = "stIdle" loginMsg.visible = "false" winAuthInfo.visible = "true" winAuthMain.visible = "false" /> <a:state id = "stError" loginMsg.value = "Please check your network." loginMsg.visible = "true" log_email.disabled = "false" log_password.disabled = "false" /> <a:state id = "stLoggingIn" loginMsg.value = "Please wait whilst logging in..." loginMsg.visible = "true" log_email.disabled = "true" log_password.disabled = "true" /> <a:state id = "stLoggedOut" loginMsg.value = "" loginMsg.visible = "false" log_email.disabled = "false" log_password.disabled = "false" winAuthInfo.visible = "false" winAuthMain.visible = "true" /> <a:state id="stIdle" /> </a:state-group> <a:window skin = "modalwindow" id = "winAuthMain" buttons = "min" visible = "true" icon = "bullet_key.png" width = "270" height = "140" title = "Log in" modal = "false" style = "position:relative;"> <a:table columns = "60,*" padding = "5" margin = "15"> <a:label value="Login:" /> <a:textbox value = "TestUser" id = "log_email" type = "username" required = "true" minlength = "1" invalidmsg = "Invalid Entry;Please enter a username" /> <a:label value="Password:" /> <a:textbox value = "open" id = "log_password" type = "password" required = "true" minlength = "1" invalidmsg = "Invalid Entry;Please enter your password" /> </a:table> <a:button bottom = "15" right = "15" width = "70" action = "login" default = "true">Login</a:button> <a:label id="loginMsg" left = "15" bottom = "15" /> </a:window> <a:window skin = "modalwindow" id = "winAuthInfo" resizable = "true" buttons = "min" visible = "false" icon = "bullet_key.png" width = "250" height = "100" title = "You are logged in" modal = "false" minwidth = "250" minheight = "100" style = "position:relative;"> <a:label id = "lblLoggedIn" top = "25" left = "10" value = "You are logged in as TestUser" style = "color:green;font-weight:bold;" /> <a:button top = "55" left = "140" width = "70" action = "logout" default = "true">Logout</a:button> </a:window> <a:script src="demo/elements/auth/code.js"></a:script>
